title: Prison
creator_credit: George Geertsen, Don Rennick and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: An animated film about what it is like to serve a term in jail. The authenticity of the film comes from careful research, interviews with prisoners, on-the-spot drawings and a sound track that was partially recorded inside a prison.
